content: **knitted baby blanket in drops big merino the piece is worked back and forth with stripes of stocking and moss stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern mb-006-by yarn group c or a + a ----------------------------------------------------------- **size** width approx 45-50-65 cm length approx 62-74-82 cm **yarn** drops big merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200-300-400 g colour 23 ice blue **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 60 cm **knitting gauge ** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
